title: Vendetta
description: When Mark Anderson witnesses his sister's murder by a known mobster, he enters a witness protection program with his daughter, Lily. Tragic circumstances suddenly thrust Mark into a web of deception and lies. Motivated by his suspicion of murder, Mark enlists the help of a sympathetic Homicide Detective to track down the killer. Mark must face his painful past in order to exact revenge and bring justice, once and for all.
author: Jennifer Moulton
